hero.title: Your AI Assistant from the
hero.subtitle: Experience next-generation AI capabilities with Albert. Free, secure, and designed specifically for Albertans.

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Engage in natural conversations with advanced AI models. Get instant answers, creative ideas, and detailed explanations.

agents.title: Agents
agents.description: Create and deploy specialized AI agents for specific tasks. Automate workflows and enhance productivity with custom intelligence.

stage.title: Stage Workflows
stage.description: Design complex multi-step workflows with our visual canvas. Chain agents and functions together for powerful automation.

imageAnalysis.title: Image Analysis
imageAnalysis.description: Upload and analyze images with AI. Extract text, detect objects, and gain insights from visual content.

voiceProcessing.title: Voice Processing
voiceProcessing.description: Convert speech to text and text to speech. Process audio files and transcribe meetings with high accuracy.

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data stays protected with enterprise-grade security. Built with privacy-first principles for Alberta's government.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Create your free account today and experience the future of AI assistance.
